channel.title: Rules
channel.description:
This section is for posting questions about anything the other sections do not cover. Do not post anything in here that relates to RuneScape Private Servers or Clients. Do not post anything in here that has to do with RuneScape Classic Servers or Clients. Things you can post about include:
[ul][li]Computer/Hardware-related problems[/li] [li]Questions about games[/li] [li]Questions on homework[/li] [li]Questions about basically anything else[/li][/ul]
This board, like the General Discussion board, is here for your usage. Please do not post anything profane or illegal in this board. All [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html]global forum rules[/url] apply.

[/quote]

Never seen you on #mopar either.[/quote]

item.title: Rules
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:4, topic:277224”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=365884.msg2775452#msg2775452 date=1241488482]
Isn’t MITB for general chat?
[/quote]

Yes, but mitb does not like MoparScape much. A moparscaper will go over there and usually get, “Go back to moparscape” or something. We decided to add one here. If it gets spammed or misused too often, we can easily remove it.[/quote]
Oh yeah, that’s true. #mopar people hate me on IRC. Lul.

Read full topic

@chassy13 wrote:

Yes, but mitb does not like MoparScape much. A moparscaper will go over there and usually get, “Go back to moparscape” or something. We decided to add one here. If it gets spammed or misused too often, we can easily remove it.

item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This section is for posting questions about anything the other sections do not cover. Do not post anything in here that relates to RuneScape Private Servers or Clients. Do not post anything in here that has to do with RuneScape Classic Servers or Clients. Things you can post about include:

[ul][li]Computer/Hardware-related problems[/li]
[li]Questions about games[/li]

[li]Questions about basically anything else[/li][/ul]

This board, like the General Discussion board, is here for your usage. Please do not post anything profane or illegal in this board. All global forum rules apply.
